00002  *   amateur v.1.4                                                          *
00003  *   analyze snapshots from Gadget 2 simulations                            *

00005  *   psteger@phys.ethz.ch                                                   *

00020 #include "AHFrun.h"

00043 void HelpUser( void ) {
00044   std::cout << "Usage: amateur SNAPSHOTID{1..?} [xamshzt]" << std::endl<<std::endl;
00045   std::cout << "where SNAPSHOT is an integer between 1 and 14" << std::endl;
00046   std::cout << "-a runs AMIGA's subhalo finder AHFstep" << std::endl;
00047   std::cout << "-m runs AMIGA's subhalo <=> halo identifier MergerTree" << std::endl;
00048   std::cout << "-s matches subhalos to their host halo" << std::endl;
00049   std::cout << "-h runs AMIGA's HaloTracker (experimental)"<<std::endl;
00050   std::cout << "-t computes the tidal field of the given snapshot at 10 smoothing scales" << std::endl;
00051   std::cout << "-x extracts information to a HDF5 file" << std::endl;
00052   std::cout << "-z analyses the snapshot file, using AMIGA's subhalos" << std::endl << std::endl;
00053   std::cout << "default: runs successively x, a, m, s, (h), z, t" << std::endl << std::endl;
00054   for(int i=0; i<18; ++i)
00055     std::cout << "  " << i+1 << " " << Snaps(i) << std::endl;
00056   std::cout << std::endl;
00057 }
00058 
00071 int main ( int argc, char *argv[ ] ) {
00072 
00073   // set nice with "int setpriority(int which, id_t who (0 = this process), int nice);"
00074   setpriority(PRIO_PROCESS, 0, 15);
00075 
00076   // say hello
00077   std::cout << std::endl << "AMATEUR by Pascal Steger, psteger@phys.ethz.ch" << std::endl;
00078   std::cout << "=================================================" << std::endl << std::endl;
00079   if ( argc <= 1 || argc > 3 ) {
00080     HelpUser();
00081     return 0;
00082   }
00083 
00084   int isnap = atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) - 1;
00085   std::cout << "    Looking at snapshot " << Snaps( isnap ) << "." << std::endl;
00086 
00087   for ( int i = 0; i < 1; ++i ) {
00088     // std::cout << "commandline argument nr. " << i << std::endl;
00089     char c = getopt( argc, argv, "amshtxz" );
00090     switch ( c ) {
00091     case 'a':
00092       std::cout << "    Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file..." << std::endl;
00093       AHFrun( isnap );
00094       break;
00095 
00096     case 'm':
00097       std::cout << "    Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree..." << std::endl;
00098       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00099       break;
00100 
00101     case 's':
00102       std::cout << "    Matching subhalos to their host..." << std::endl;
00103       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00104       break;
00105 
00106     case 'h':
00107       std::cout << "Running HaloTracker..."<<std::endl;
00108       //HaloTrackerRun( isnap );
00109       break;
00110 
00111     case 't':
00112       std::cout << "    Computing tidal field..." << std::endl;
00113       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00114       break;
00115 
00116     case 'x':
00117       std::cout << "    Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." << std::endl;
00118       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00119       break;
00120 
00121     case 'z':
00122       std::cout << "    Analyzing snapshot file with HaloProperties..." << std::endl;
00123       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00124       break;
00125 
00126     default:
00127       std::cout << "    Default: Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." << std::endl;
00128       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00129       std::cout << "    Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file..." << std::endl;
00130       AHFrun( isnap );
00131       std::cout << "    Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree..." << std::endl;
00132       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00133       std::cout << "    Matching subhalos to their host..." << std::endl;
00134       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00135       std::cout << "Running HaloTracker..."<<std::endl;
00136       // HaloTrackerRun(isnap);
00137       std::cout << "    Analyzing snapshot file with HaloProperties..." << std::endl;
00138       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00139       std::cout << "    Computing tidal field..." << std::endl;
00140       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00141     }
00142   }
00143   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00144 }
